info.description: API to access the DEA's ARCOS data prepared by [The Washington Post](https://www.washingtonpost.com/graphics/2019/investigations/dea-pain-pill-database/).  Check out the R package [arcos](https://github.com/wpinvestigative/arcos) and Python library [arcospy](https://pypi.org/project/arcospy/), which are wrappers for this API. Use "WaPo" as the key or use any of the keys [listed here](https://github.com/wpinvestigative/arcos/blob/master/keys/keys.txt).  We reserve the right to discontinue these keys and invite users to sign up for their own individual one in the future if the need arises. There are three categories of data offered in this API. 1) Raw and slices of the raw data   2) Summarized data (based on our [filters and criteria](https://www.washingtonpost.com/national/2019/07/18/how-download-use-dea-pain-pills-database/)) for easier analysis  and 3) Supplemental data, such as county, census tracts, and latitude and longitude for chain and retail pharmacies. Please refer to [our guidelines](https://www.washingtonpost.com/national/2019/07/18/how-download-use-dea-pain-pills-database/) for using this data.
info.title: Washington Post ARCOS API

get.summary: Returns all data by county (Will be large and could take extra time to load)

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key needed to make query successful

parameters.name: county
parameters.description: If provided, filter the data to only this county (e.g. 'Mingo')

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: If provided, filter the data to only this state (e.g. 'WV')

get.summary: Returns all data by county (Will be large and could take extra time to load)

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key needed to make query successful

parameters.name: county
parameters.description: Filter the data to only this county (e.g. 'Sonoma')

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Filter the data to only this state (e.g. 'CA')

parameters.name: drug
parameters.description: Filter the data to only this drug (e.g. 'FENTANYL')

parameters.name: buyer_bus_act
parameters.description: If included, filters the data to only this buyer type (e.g. 'HOSP/CLINIC' or 'RETAIL PHARMACY')

get.summary: Returns all data by county FIPS code (Will be large and could take extra time to load)

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key needed to make query successful

parameters.name: fips
parameters.description: If provided, filter the data to only this county (e.g. '01001' for Autauga, Alabama)

get.summary: Returns all data by county FIPS code (Will be large and could take extra time to load)

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key needed to make query successful

parameters.name: fips
parameters.description: Filter the data to only this county (e.g. '09003' for Hartford, Connecticut)

parameters.name: drug
parameters.description: Filter the data to only this drug (e.g. 'FENTANYL')

parameters.name: buyer_bus_act
parameters.description: If included, filters the data to only this buyer type (e.g. 'HOSP/CLINIC' or 'RETAIL PHARMACY')
